DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety feasibility use NeuroFlo catheter treat acute ischemic stroke patient follow administration intravenous tPA .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Safety NeuroFlo Stroke Patients Receiving Tissue Plasminogen Activator
DOC.criteria: Ischemic stroke NIHSS 522 Persistent clinical deficit follow administration rtPA Planned thrombectomy Aortic pathology Severe heart disease Other condition doctor ass
